org.knime.core.data.util.memory

Class MemoryAlertSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.knime.core.data.util.memory.MemoryAlertSystem

  • public final class MemoryAlertSystem
extends Object
    Implementation of a simple memory warning system. You can either register a listener via addListener(MemoryAlertListener) that get notified if free memory gets low. This is useful for cases where memory is kept in some kind of cache. Or you can check isMemoryLow() while processing data.
    Since:
    2.12
    Author:
    Christian Dietz, University of Konstanz, Thorsten Meinl, KNIME.com, Zurich, Switzerland

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  MemoryAlertSystem.MemoryActionIndicator
      Interface for a simple stateful object that indicates if action because of low memory should be taken.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DEFAULT_USAGE_THRESHOLD
      The threshold of medium memory usage that triggers a memory event.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_USAGE_THRESHOLD

        public static final double DEFAULT_USAGE_THRESHOLD
        The threshold of medium memory usage that triggers a memory event. The threshold is set to 90% of the total memory minus 128MB.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMemoryAlert

        public void sendMemoryAlert()
        Send a memory alert events to all registered listeners. Should only be used for testing purposes.

      • addListener

        public boolean addListener(MemoryAlertListener listener)
        Registers a new listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener
        Returns:
        true if the listener was added, false otherwise

      • removeListener

        public boolean removeListener(MemoryAlertListener listener)
        Removes a registered listener,
        Parameters:
        listener - a listener
        Returns:
        true if the listener was removed, false otherwise

      • setFractionUsageThreshold

        public void setFractionUsageThreshold(double percentage)
        Set percentage level of the amount of memory in tenured space which may be set before a memory warning event is thrown. Note that this changes a global value, therefore use with care!
        Parameters:
        percentage - the fraction of used memory after garbage collection, a value between 0 and 1
        No public API: not to be referenced by clients
        This method is not intended to be referenced by clients.

      • getUsedMemory

        public static long getUsedMemory()
        Returns the currently used amount of memory in the old generation memory pool.
        Returns:
        the used memory in bytes

      • getMaximumMemory

        public static long getMaximumMemory()
        Returns the maximum amount of memory available in the old generation memory pool.
        Returns:
        the available memory in bytes

      • getUsage

        public static double getUsage()
        Returns the current memory usage as a fraction between 0 and 1.
        Returns:
        the current memory usage

      • isMemoryLow

        public boolean isMemoryLow()
        Returns if the memory usage is above the configured threshold. The flag will be cleared when the next garbage collector run can free enough memory.
        Returns:
        true if memory is low, false otherwise

      • sleepWhileLow

        public boolean sleepWhileLow(double threshold,
                             long timeout)
                      throws InterruptedException
        Calling this method will hold the current thread in case a low memory condition is present. It will sleep until enough memory is available again. You can specify a timeout after which the method returns even if memory is still low.
        Parameters:
        threshold - a usage threshold which must be greater or equal to the threshold of the memory alert system
        timeout - the maximum waiting time in milliseconds
        Returns:
        true if memory is available again, false if the timeout has elapsed and memory is still low
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting

      • newIndicator

        public MemoryAlertSystem.MemoryActionIndicator newIndicator()
        Creates a new memory action indicator.
        Returns:
        a new indicator
        Since:
        3.0

      • getInstance

        public static MemoryAlertSystem getInstance()
        Singleton instance of MemoryAlertSystem.
        Returns:
        the singleton instance
